scripts.build: rimraf dist && babel src --out-dir dist/js && copyfiles etc/** dist
scripts.dev: node --version && cross-env DEBUG=api:* PORT=8084 MAIL_TEMPLATE_PATH=etc/user/templates MAIL_CONFIG_PATH=../secured/user REST_PATH=src/rest nodemon src/index.js --exec babel-node
scripts.test: cross-env DEBUG=api:*,test:* NODE_ENV=test PORT=9004 MAIL_TEMPLATE_PATH=etc/user/templates MAIL_CONFIG_PATH=../secured/user REST_PATH=src/rest mocha --recursive --require babel-register --exit "test/**/*.js"
scripts.testOne: cross-env DEBUG=api:*,test:* NODE_ENV=test PORT=9004 MAIL_TEMPLATE_PATH=etc/user/templates MAIL_CONFIG_PATH=../secured/user REST_PATH=src/rest mocha --recursive --require babel-register --exit "test/testPostLoginInteg.js"
